bibl.title: O "kolonial'nom" sel'skom khozjajstve v ptolemeevskom Egipte. Avec résumé en anglais: "Colonial" Agriculture in Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.note: Regards the attempts of the first Greek colonists to develop and rationalize the Egyptian agricultural space not as a manifestation of their "feeling for the nature" or competence, but as a result of the fiscal requirements of the Early Ptolemies.
bibl.seg: LITVINENKO Yu.N., O "kolonial'nom" sel'skom khozjajstve v ptolemeevskom Egipte. Avec résumé en anglais: "Colonial" Agriculture in Ptolemaic Egypt.

Regards the attempts of the first Greek colonists to develop and rationalize the Egyptian agricultural space not as a manifestation of their "feeling for the nature" or competence, but as a result of the fiscal requirements of the Early Ptolemies.
